sentences.sentence: One way out of this may be a second curious physical phenomenon—the thermoelectric effect.
sentences.translation: 解决这个问题的方法之一可能是第二种奇怪的物理现象——热电效应。

sentences.sentence: One way out of this may be a second curious physical phenomenon, the thermoelectric effect.
sentences.translation: 解决这个问题的方法之一可能是第二种奇特的物理现象，热电效应。

sentences.sentence: The trick to a good thermoelectric material is a crystal structure in which electrons can flow freely.
sentences.translation: 制造一种好的热电材料的关键是，需要一种电子可以自由流动的晶体结构。
